Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for your recent inquiry about purchase order invoicing! To set up your corporate account, we’ll need the following:
1. The email address registered at BorrowLenses.com. If approved, we’ll apply the PO option to this account. 2. Purchase Order application (attached) 3. Tax Exemption form (if applicable) 4. Certificate of Insurance (if applicable)
Once we have this information, it’ll take 3-5 business days to determine whether purchase order is granted.
Please let me know if you have any questions, or if there’s anything else I can do to help.
Thanks,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} BorrowLenses.com Purchase Order Accounts accounts@BorrowLenses.com
